title: Simulation Training to Strengthen Information Literacy Skills in Academic Libraries

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic research and understanding of core principles for utilizing research materials
context.additional_context: Cultivates skills in utilizing digital resources and data management systems of academic libraries to enhance research efficiency for science practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply academic database search strategies with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can consistently evaluate the credibility of academic resources using a reliability assessment framework across three or more practical exercises
Learners can communicate by implementing three or more information-sharing strategies with peers in a collaborative simulation environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
